name: OREGANO WARUNG
address: Crystal Bay Beach, Jl. Raya, Sakti, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: Best fish on Nusa Penida! Fresh and delicious red snapper for only 100k with rice and vegetables for 2 people. It was so good that we went there 3 nights in a row. The family that runs the place is super friendly and welcoming. Dessert was yummy as well
review 2: The only place open in the surrounding. The lady is extremely nice and the service was really quick. Value for money is great. Considering you are in the middle of nowhere we were really happy - fried veggies were relatively excellent.
review 3: Incredibly nice, family run place. The fish I had was above average in quality and came with home made sauces, not something usual around here. Burger was ok, but get 2 if you are really hungry. Spring rolls were hand made, unfortunately not seasoned at all and the (probably) home made sweet chilli sauce wasnt strong enough in taste. Alltogether nice place, especially value for money!
review 4: Lovely family-run place with great fresh food and prices. Delicious noodle soup for just 20k IDR and mains for just 30-40k IDR. Recommended!
review 5: People are super nice, food was amazing, many vegetarian options. Would recommend to all me friends and would come back again!

name: NYUH KADAH GUEST HOUSE
address: Jalan Raya Crystal Bay Nusa Penida Klungkung, Sakti, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: Great stay! Cozy.. clean.. spacious. Nice garden. Strategic location. Surrounded by greenery. Good value for money. Very friendly and accomodating owners... üôèThank you so much Pak Ketut.. Bu Ketut for accomodating us.
review 2: Really nice place and lovely host! You can rent bikes from here and there are lots of nice restaurants within walking distance. Rooms have AC.
review 3: Very nice people and location, cold rooms. Seems far at first but if you rent a scooter you‚Äôre near some cool beaches and restaurants!
review 4:
Ketut and his family gave us a very kind welcome, they gave us advices during our stay (we stayed 4 nights) and also brought us to the harbour to take our boat when we left.
The room was big, very nice and perfectly cleaned ! The garden is lovely and taken cared of.
Also the guesthouse is well located, near Crystal bay and have some very good warungs around to have lunch or diner. (Special thanks to Oregano)
Breakfast is included, you can choose either coffee or tea, and banana pancake or omelet.
We definitely recommend to stay here durig your stay in Nusa Penida üòä
review 5:
The rooms were really nice, the owner is really friendly, the price is realtively low and it even includes breakfast. They have a beautiful garden.
Renting a scooter is neccessary. There are some really good restaurants nearby.

name: GRIYATAMA WARUNG
address: Jl. Raya Crystal Bay, Sakti, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: Great place. We stayed here for two nights and liked it a lot.  Friendly and service minded people running this place. The food is also good and for a reasonable price.
review 2: We stayed in the Griya Tama vila. The experience could not be better. The place was very nice and clean. The staff was excellent. They were very helpful and friendly. The food in the restaurant was pretty good, from the tasty banana pancakes to the fruit, spring rolls, club sandwich, and noodles. Location was also good, very close to crystal bay and not far from the harbour. They also rented us two motorbikes.
review 3:
Absolutely stunning place.

We stayed here, ate here, and had multiple experiences organised by the MORE than capable host, Gede.
We were a group of 4 friends and this was such a wonderful place! Even a trip to the pharmacy prior to a Manta Ray diving trip was no problem and swiftly arranged.

Breakfasts were the best and we loved the Balinese coffee. Smoothie bowl highly recommended.

Dinner excellent, had burgers and wraps and boths were excellent.

Attention to detail immaculate. We loved wvery minute. Thank you.
review 4: Let me tell you about the best restaurant on the island. The food is amazing and you can definitely taste the love in each bite. We had breakfast here every morning. Omelette and pancakes are a hit. For dinner i recommend getting the gado gado , a must try. The chicken satay is peanuty and delicious. 10/10 definitely recommend
review 5:
Great place, lovely people Gede and his wife .. A cute and cosy room, near the harbour. They helped us arrange the snorkelling tour. They have bikes for rent too.. A pick up and drop to and fro the harbour was also arranged by their team . A great place to stay if you are looking for a reasonable price.
The only thing we missed was a swimming pool ..
May be that can come up soon..

name: Dangin Kubu Bungalow
address: Sakti, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: We stayed here earlier in the year and could not fault the service and generosity of Nyoman. He went above and beyond to ensure our stay was comfortable and helped us out with rides on several occasions. The bungalow was very sweet, the breakfasts provided were and we enjoyed our time here at this family run business.
review 2: Our host Nyoman was beyond exceptional in every way possible. 10/10 recommend staying here if you‚Äôre in Nusa Penida, great location close to everything you want to see. Also great bungalows, comfy and cozy bed. I couldn‚Äôt say more positive things about Nyoman and the atmosphere he has created. He is a wonderful human being inside and out. Please make this part of your journey when in Bali. Much love to Nyoman and his family :)
review 3:
Fantastic please, clean and big rooms. The owner is really kind. Breakfast is ok.
As it is a bed and breakfast, not exactly the best place if you want to socialize, but still really recommended.
review 4:
Absolutely gorgeous rooms, lovely quiet location but can reach everything easily on the scooter.

INCREDIBLE BREAKFAST!! Choice of omlette, scrambled egg or Pancake (Pineapple or banana) and then you can choose a fresh juice (Pineapple, watermelon, banana), tea or coffee:)
review 5: Very nice and convenience place to stay in Nusa Penida. Staff are so friendly, delicious breakfast with lots of greens surrounding

name: Red Chili Penida
address: 7FWG+5GG, Sakti, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
We ate at Red Chili four times in a row for dinner and really liked it, except for the pizza.

Asian Food: The best dish was the Tom Yum soup with steamed rice. If you like Asian food, you should definitely try it.

Western Food: We also tried the spaghetti bolognese and it was amazing.

Other Good Eats: We liked the mie goreng, nasi goreng, and desserts like churros. The cocktails were great too.

Service: The people who work at Red Chili are very friendly and make you feel welcome.

Location & Prices: If you're staying around here, Red Chili is the best place we found to eat. The prices are a bit more than a regular warung but very affordable with a lower price than most restaurants.

They don‚Äôt add a service charge, so you can tip the staff if you‚Äôre happy with the food and service.
review 2:
Great location, excellent service, great ambience!

Welcomed by the staff with a great smile.
Ordered our drinks & food. Had the mocktails, Penida Good Day & Mango Mint Lassi. Very refreshing!

Food, we had Seafood Tom Yum & Salad.
The tom yum... IMPRESSIVE! Taste sooooo good! We even talked about it after we left the place. And the salad dressing is yummmeh~

The wait staff came to check on us & ensure that everything is well.

I must say that the team really put in alot of effort! From the beautiful food presentation (very instragrammable, Haha!) the beverages & overall experience is just AMAZING!

Thanks for the perfect dining experience which made our day! We'll sure to come back the next time!
review 3: We were dining there for 3 nights, the food is great and the staff were really friendly and kind, especially the waitress who was singing the songs from the radio!üçï
review 4: This place is amazing! The staff is friendly and the food is delicious üòç also, this place is so clean and have good music. Enjoy!! üôè‚ù§Ô∏è
review 5:
Excellent atmosphere, was driving through the dark and windy road till I came past this glowing open themed restaurant. Very out of place on what I was expecting.
To this me and my gf pulled over and met Gede at the red chilli restaurant!
As bright is as amazing as there food and staff!
Great chats with Gede and enjoyed an amazing chilli verdee and cocktails!

I would strongly suggest to find your way here and have a chat with Gede and try there amazing menu!

name: Warung kubu restaurant & souvenir & Radjas bungalow
address: Sakti, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: Honestly, I don't know about the food, but I don't recommend to buy in the souvenir shop. It was really expensive to buy anything, even after bargain for a long time. When you ask for a price, they tell You different prices depending of the woman You ask, that's why we feel very cheated all the time. You can buy souvenirs for better price at Bali airport.
review 2: Beautiful food western or local,  lovely owner great service this place a must on Nusa Penida island, also the most beautiful homestay with gorgeous gardens‚ù§
review 3: Wonders to find in the store. The wooden carvings are amazing. I met a fabulous person (a woman traveler), which made the experience perfect.
review 4: Very chill. Amazing food (especially the chips/fries and spring rolls). Reasonable price.
review 5: Fruits and juice are good to have it here not the food.. they don't even know to prepare a simple omelet and scrambled eggs it tastes weird and in this room they don't provide water bottles everyday the only one day of check-in they give u two small bottles of water.

name: Warung Sate Pari
address: 7FVH+49C, Sakti, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: We absolutely loved this place and kept going back as much as we could during our stay. The hours are strange and there‚Äôs no telling if she will be open or closed but seems she‚Äôs open for lunch most days! The prices are the best we have found on the whole island. Most authentic style cooking as well. The food was always delicious and great portions. Oh and cute pups too :)
review 2: Best place to eat around. The food is delicious and even though is not a fancy place, you can enjoy a tasteful dinner. Price is super good too, and owners are gentle. We ate there 2 of 2 days we were in Penida :)
review 3: Happy to find a local place finally! The food was suuuuuuper good and good prices! The family was friendly :)
review 4:
Food here is delicious and adorable, around 25k per dish. We didn't have to wait too long for out food. As other reviews said this place is not a tourist trap and will charge you fair prices.

We've got Sate Ayam (chicken skewers with peanut sauce served with sice) and Mie Goreng (mildly spicy noodles with egg on top).
review 5:
The most authentic food (little bit spicy) we had so far on Bali & Penida :)! Food is amazing & prices as well.
Friendly guys took care about our veggie preferences and also served Gado-Gado without having it on the menu. You should stop here

name: radjes bungalow
address: jalam raya sakti, banjar, Sakti, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
It was our best stay during our 1 month vacation in Bali and the nearby islands! Wen we arrived I asked the family do they live in paradise or am I just dreaming ü§Ø‚ò∫Ô∏è They didn‚Äôt speak much english so I don‚Äôt know if they understood me but these 2 nights there are our most romantic memory in 1 month!

You are surrounded by the nature in and it is so quiet there. And the beat thing is that it is owned by the family who are kind and happy people. We felt like we were guests to our family! And we already miss the place and the family! ‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è
review 2:
A lovely bungalow with hills view the breakfast was so great
Staff and the owner were so friendly
‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

name: LAMIMA RESTAURANT
address: 7FVH+69H, Sakti, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
Located close to the Crystal Bay Beach, this cafe offers a perfect blend of delightful cuisine. I've lived in penida for 3 months and this new cafe has quickly become my favorite cafe so far, thanks to its exceptional food.

I ordered lumpia and fried rice, the lumpia here is a true delight. Crispy on the outside and filled with a flavorful mix of vegetables and spices, each bite offers a satisfying crunch followed by a burst of savory goodness. It's served with a tangy dipping sauce that perfectly complements the rich flavors of the filling.

the fried rice is equally impressive. Cooked to perfection, the rice is fragrant and loaded with a generous mix of fresh vegetables, lots of seafood and a blend of aromatic spices, making it a must-try for anyone that's visiting Penida üíô
review 2:
Very good restaurant run by locals.
Good food and service.
If you need more flavour on the meal, ask for side spices, they bring you hot ones!
review 3: Very nice new place to eat. The staff is very polite and sweet. They put the effort to make a beautiful plate, taste great! I orderd the traditional rendang but instead of rice i asked for french fries with the dish (you should try it!). My sister had the cap cay with chicken and rice also very nice. As a dessert we had pisang goreng (banana fritter). Definately recommend this place!
review 4: We stopped at that place for lunch and had an incredible time. The food was amazing, the staff is very nice, we received a free desert for my friend‚Äôs birthday and a free coconut for the opening of the restaurant. They removed the meat of a salad to make it vegetarian for me. The chairs are also really comfortable and it wasn‚Äôt too hot thanks to the fan. I highly recommend!
review 5: Delicious food in very good prices :) Nice atmosphere too üòá

name: Halo nusa garden
address: Unnamed Road, 7FVM+F3P, Sakti, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
